backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, leadership word submissions, activity submissions, and access‑controlled data storage using Maps and Lists.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing a single bio‑page update requirement and the related frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and recent updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root setup configuring TanStack Router routes and React Query provider for all pages.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Application shell with navigation, authentication controls, and responsive header layout.
frontend/src/components/HeroBanner.tsx: Reusable hero banner component rendering a background image with title and optional subtitle.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipWordPa: Component fetching and displaying leadership word counts with optional polling and bar visualization.
frontend/src/components/MicroSolutionsCo: Fetches and displays community micro‑solutions with optional polling, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: A layout wrapper that renders children inside a styled, centered page section.
frontend/src/components/SignInGate.tsx: Blocks access to content unless the user is authenticated, showing a sign‑in prompt when needed.
frontend/src/content/movieReferences.ts: Exports a list of movie and film‑series citation strings used in activities and reference pages.
frontend/src/content/proposalContent.ts: Provides structured text content for a proposal, including title, abstracts, bio, and outcomes.
frontend/src/content/references.ts: Defines and exports the complete ordered list of academic references with stable keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context and provider using Internet Identity, exposing identity and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and submitting leadership words and micro‑solutions, including optimistic cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Displays an overview of the two activities with descriptions and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/Activity1LeadershipWo: Implements Activity 1 form handling, submission, validation, and affirmation/quote retrieval.
frontend/src/pages/Activity2ResilientLea: Implements Activity 2 form handling, submission, validation, and inspirational quote retrieval.
frontend/src/pages/BioPage.tsx: Renders author bio, background details, and external profile links.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipBoardPage.t: Shows community leadership word patterns and micro‑solutions with live polling.
Renders a page showing learning outcomes pulled from proposalContent, displayed in styled cards with icons.
frontend/src/pages/MovieReferencesPage.t: Displays a list of movie references from movieReferences with styled cards under a hero banner.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Shows the abstract and full abstract from proposalContent along with links to activities and learning outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/ReferencesPage.tsx: Lists academic references from REFERENCES in styled blocks under a hero banner.
frontend/src/pages/SessionOutlinePage.ts: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SlidesPage.tsx: Provides access to presentation slides via an image QR code within a styled section.
frontend/src/pages/TakeawaysPage.tsx: Displays key takeaways from proposalContent in styled cards with icons.
frontend/src/utils/activity1Affirmations: Generates leadership affirmation messages and selects a matching academic reference based on user inputs.
frontend/src/utils/activity2Validation.t: Detects themes in user responses, generates validation messages, and selects appropriate references based on keywords.
Maps UI challenge type string keys to backend ChallengeType enum values.
frontend/src/utils/isVillainousInput.ts: Checks text for negative or harmful keywords or phrases to flag villainous input.
frontend/src/utils/quoteFormatting.ts: Maps backend QuoteGenre enum values to human-readable franchise names.
frontend/src/utils/referenceSelection.ts: Validates reference formats and provides deterministic or fallback selection of valid references.
frontend/src/utils/starWarsQuotes.ts: Defines a StarWarsQuote interface, a list of curated Star Wars quotes, and a deterministic quote selector based on a numeric seed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingError.ts: Converts various error types into user-friendly messages, handling initialization, validation, network, and generic errors.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including schema version, feature states, issues, and pending feature requests.
